main event: A letter describes a UFO sighting experienced during an outdoor gathering in New York on August 5, 1967.
interesting points: The observer described a light that hovered at high altitude and moved very fast,The light would hover for a few seconds before darting off at tremendous speeds,The observer felt hesitant to report the sighting at the time due to fear of ridicule,The communication was addressed to Major Quintanilla of the Air Force,The report indicates that a preliminary investigation was assigned but lacked enough information for a definite identification.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: The observer was part of a gathering of friends who experienced the sighting together.
